title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes.
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: When the poor lady returned, she saw upon the table, with its mouth stuffed fullof food, the bloody head of her brother, Drummond of Drummondernoch, whomthe outlaws had met and murdered in the wood.
